articles.author: Hilary Lewis
articles.title: Julian McMahon, Australian Actor Known for ‘Nip/Tuck’ and ‘Fantastic Four’ Movies, Dies at 56 - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: He was recently in Netflix's murder mystery series 'The Residence' as well as the 2024 movies 'The Surfer' and 'The Supremes at Earl's All-You-Can-Eat.'
articles.content:
Julian McMahon, the Australian actor known for his roles in Nip/Tuck and two Fantastic Four movies from 2005 and 2007, has died after a battle with cancer. He was 56.
McMahon died Wednesday in Clear… [+3167 chars]
